Se.1: Customize the embed code within target platform to suit your site or app styles and placement.
Se.2: Optionally, parametrize the embed code attributes using React props.
Se.3: Use stateless component as you will most likely not maintain embed UI state locally in your component.

Ss.1: Identify root level component name that represents your sample. Define component.
Ss.2: Split sample code HTML, CSS, JavaScript into separate files.
